description:
The Union ace pilot Graham Aker confronts Setsuna as he leaves Ceylon. Graham`s Union Flag mobile suit proves to be no match for Setsuna`s Gundam, but he returns from battle to learn that he and Billy Katagiri have been reassigned to a new anti-Gundam investigative taskforce.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: โลกที่เปลี่ยนไป
